summary: Protective Love
title: Protective Love
body:
by ArtWolf

This is an AU where Peter is the son of the millionaire Tony Stark and Steve Rogers. Unfortunately, he has no powers and some major baddies are after him. After some thinking and planning, they decide that the merc with the mouth himself, Deadpool, would be the best person to guard Peter. What happens when they meet? Find out.
Warnings:
Minor deaths
Peter is 18,Wade is 24.
Wade has scars but he doesn’t have them as bad. He has hair and it’s like blonde(cause that’s a comic version of him) and has blue eyes.
My knowledge of Marvel is only a few but I’ll see if I can remember anything more.

Words: 1537, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Wade Wilson, Peter Parker
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Smut, College, Fluff, Cutesy, Angst

blog.name: megafandomfreak
blog.title: Marvel
blog.description: Anything and everything Marvel. I'm way too obssessed

summary: People ask me why I like Tony Stark so much. I always just respond with “oh cause he’s just a cool guy and he’s funny I...
body:
People ask me why I like Tony Stark so much. I always just respond with “oh cause he’s just a cool guy and he’s funny I guess…” That is so far from the truth. Yes he is the most amazingly cool guy ever, and he’s got a pretty amazing sense of humor, but that doesn’t even scratch the surface of why I love him so much. Ever since I was little I’ve looked up to him, in a way wanted to be like him. I struggled with math and science but then I thought to myself “Tony Stark is good at it, I can try and be good at it like him too!” I was pretty young at the time but looking back it helped me a lot. I also struggle with anxiety. When he got ptsd and anxiety in iron man 3 it broke my heart, but it was amazing to finally have a hero to relate to in that way. Sometimes I feel alone in my anxiety, but Tony helped to show me that it’s not just people like me, but some of the best people in the world can develop anxiety and have mental health problems too.

But I guess he’s just a cool guy I mean I don’t know…

summary:
Stephen: Tony, I'm so happy! I could kiss you right now!
Tony: *nervous bi laugh*
Tony: Um... Neat!
[Later]
Tony: *lying face...
body:
Stephen: Tony, I’m so happy! I could kiss you right now!

Tony: *nervous bi laugh*

Tony: Um… Neat!

[Later]

Tony: *lying face down on his bed*

Tony: I can’t believe I said ‘neat’, Bruce! 'Neat’! Nobody says 'neat’ anymore! It’s the goddamn 21st century! It’s not neat to say 'neat’ but I said it anyway! I’m such a loser!

Bruce: *idly turns his science magazines page*

Bruce: Hey, don’t beat yourself up. Everyone gets nervous sometimes. Remember what happened when Thor confessed to me?

Tony: Didn’t you like, thank him?

Bruce, closes the magazine to stare at the ceiling: I thanked him.

blog.description: Hi! Welcome to the blog of the Ironstrange Family!

summary: Hey, Peter! Have you ever met Princess Shuri? If so, what's she like? Also, unrelated, can you lift Mjolnir?
question: Hey, Peter! Have you ever met Princess Shuri? If so, what's she like? Also, unrelated, can you lift Mjolnir?
answer:
they’ve been friends for years! thanks to T’challa and Tony

Also Peter can move it a bit but that was a few years ago and Thor’s currently off-world. He’ll try again next time he sees Thor.

summary: Honey, It Happened!
title: Honey, It Happened!
body:
by DrogonTheDragon

“Steve, calm down. What happened?”

“Peter crawled!”

Tony stopped moving. He could feel his heartbeat drumming in his ears. Did he miss Peter crawl for the first time? How was that even possible? He was always with Peter. Always.

Words: 1137, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of Momentous Moments

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Peter Parker
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Steve Rogers & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Baby Peter Parker, Superfamily, Superhusbands, Tony Stark Needs a Hug

summary: IronPanther Updates
title: IronPanther Updates
body:
‘Betrayal’ - Chapter Five Posted.

‘Sweet as Sugar’ New Story, Chapter One Posted. Summary - Sam and Bucky tell Tony of this lesser-known coffee place that literally has the best coffee on Earth, and when Tony sees the man serving him, coffee isn’t the only thing he wants.

summary: It Wasn't You
title: It Wasn't You
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2L15vxp

by camichats

A month and a half ago, Rhodey was kidnapped and replaced with a Skrull without anyone noticing. In that time, he and Tony got together. Now though, they know he’s a Skrull, and Tony tries to figure out how to live with what’s happened.

summary: I'm With You Till The End of Line
title: I'm With You Till The End of Line
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/31EVxYD

by Hdhdhhf

“Peggy, it’s alright tell the kid I love him now I’ll finally be able to see my husband my brother my mom”

Sandra Rogers pilot, sister, wife, godmother, daughter and friend. What leaps will she take to help her country? Will she ever see the men she holds close to her heart?

Also in this au the serum makes people immortal sorta you’ll just have to read also Natasha can have kids in this au

blog.name: incorrect-marvel-2019
blog.title: Incorrect Marvel Quotes
blog.description: Incorrect Avengers Quotes with the occasional cameo from the X-Men! Daily updates!

tags: this was too funny not to post
summary:
Peter: Hey Mister Stark, Today MJ said that boys can’t multitask. But I’m great at multitasking!
Tony: Oh. Go on. What makes you...
body:
Peter: Hey Mister Stark, Today MJ said that boys can’t multitask. But I’m great at multitasking!

Tony: Oh. Go on. What makes you say that?

Peter: Well before the spider bite, back when I still played Sax, I used to lie in my bed and play with my eyes closed. That meant that I could practice and nap at the same time!

Tony: Whilst I admire your creativity kiddo, has anyone ever told you that you are just a little bit strange?

reblog.comment:

Tony: Whilst I admire your creativity kiddo, has anyone ever told you that you are just a little bit strange?
trail.content:
Peter: Hey Mister Stark, Today MJ said that boys can’t multitask. But I’m great at multitasking!

Tony: Oh. Go on. What makes you say that?

Peter: Well before the spider bite, back when I still played Sax, I used to lie in my bed and play with my eyes closed. That meant that I could practice and nap at the same time!

Tony: Whilst I admire your creativity kiddo, has anyone ever told you that you are just a little bit strange?
